event FlashLoan(address indexed flp, address indexed asset, uint256 amount, uint256 fee)
function executeOperation(address asset, uint256 amount, uint256 premium, address initiator, bytes params) returns (tuple(uint256 debt, uint256 fee, address flp, address asset, bytes swapData) _data)
function repayFlashLoan(address flp, address asset, uint256 amount)
function takeFlashLoan(tuple(uint256 debt, uint256 fee, address flp, address asset, bytes swapData) data, bytes config) payable
